content.question: Which of the following explains how civil society interacts with politics in both Nigeria and Mexico?

choices.label: Nigeria and Mexico both totally repress civil society, which undermines democracy by reducing individual freedoms.
Nigeria and Mexico both suffer from a corporatist structure that undermines the power of civil society.
Nigeria and Mexico both benefit from an increasingly active civil society, much of which focuses on reducing corruption.
Nigeria and Mexico both have civil societies deeply rooted in their long histories of democracy.

content.answer: Nigeria and Mexico both benefit from an increasingly active civil society, much of which focuses on reducing corruption.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with similar political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
